trans-unit.resname: PDP13·1 | Primordial Hydra | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

trans-unit.resname: PDP13·1 | Primordial Hydra | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME.

trans-unit.resname: PDP13·1 | Primordial Hydra | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has trample as long as it has ten or more +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME has trample as long as it has ten or more +1/+1 counters on it.

trans-unit.resname: PDP13·2 | Serra Avatar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to your life total.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to your life total.

trans-unit.resname: PDP13·2 | Serra Avatar | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

trans-unit.resname: PDP13·3 | Vampire Nocturnus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Play with the top card of your library revealed.
trans-unit.target: Play with the top card of your library revealed.

trans-unit.resname: PDP13·3 | Vampire Nocturnus | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As long as the top card of your library is black, CARDNAME and other Vampire creatures you control get +2/+1 and have flying.
trans-unit.target: As long as the top card of your library is black, CARDNAME and other Vampire creatures you control get +2/+1 and have flying.
